com.yantra.api.omp.order

Interface getOrderInvoiceDetailList

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface getOrderInvoiceDetailList

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getOrderInvoiceDetailList(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The getOrderInvoiceDetailList API returns a list of order invoice details that satisfy the input criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrderInvoiceDetailList

        org.w3c.dom.Document getOrderInvoiceDetailList(YFSEnvironment env,
                                               org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                        throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                               java.rmi.RemoteException

        The getOrderInvoiceDetailList API returns a list of order invoice details that satisfy the input criteria. The input criteria might include a value or range for OrderInvoiceKey, InvoiceNo, MasterInvoiceNo, OrderHeaderKey or OrderNo. For a detailed listing of input criteria, see the input XML. This API supports all pagination strategies through the getPage API. See getPage API for more information.
        Once an order completes its normal life cycle, it is archived into history tables. The getOrderInvoiceDetailList API returns information from either the history or non-history tables. Pass IsHistory as Y to read from the history tables, N to read from the non-history tables.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised: None

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Parameters:
        inXML - Required. Criteria for which a list of order invoice details must be returned. For more information, see the associated input xml files.
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains a list of order invoices. For details on the output, refer to the associated output xml files.

        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
